import React from 'react' function OrderItem({order, token, getter, updater}) { const {id, name, count, complete} = order; const key = id + 'OrderItem' return (
  • {id}. {name}
    {count} Product{(count === 1)?'s':''}
    {(complete === 0) ? 'Not':''} Complete
    getter(token(), id)} className='fa fa-plus text-success hover-spin'>
    • ) } export default OrderItem
